title: Fix GLiNERConfig token_level model_type detection

description: Verify span_mode token-level vs token_level mismatch, confirm intent via git history, patch model_type comparisons, add regression coverage, and validate.

title: PR13: fix noisy-jsonl validation block

description: Update ptbr/__main__.py validate path callsite to pass pathlib.Path to print_and_log_result

title: PR13: enforce local custom-column checks

title: Integrate PR13 fixes into staging and push
